concept.title: Step 5. Update the Configuration Files
concept.shortdesc: A new version can include new properties and configuration files required for to start or function properly. The configuration files are stored in the $SDC_CONF directory, including the sdc.properties file and the related realm properties files, keystore files, LDAP files, and the logj4 properties file.

conbody.p: Compare the previous and new versions of the configuration files, and update the new files as needed with the same customized property values.

For example, compare the files in the /etc/sdc1302 directory with the files in the /etc/sdc directory. Update the new files in the /etc/sdc directory with any customizations made in the previous files in the /etc/sdc1302 directory.
